Steam Condenser with RNN controller¶

Source: Yaghoubi, Shakiba, and Georgios Fainekos. “Gray-box Adversarial Testing for Control Systems with Machine Learning Components.”, HSCC (2019)

Inputs:

Case 1) Any input in the range:

input_range = [3.99 ,4.01]

Case 2) Piecewise constant inputs with 20 even pieces in the above range.

Requirement:

□_[30 35] (87<= pressure <=87.5)

In order to run staliro with “Simulated Annealing or Uniform Random Sampling combined with Gradinet Descent”, latest version of Staliro is required. More information can be found under StalirotrunkdemosGradient descentReadme

stgem
